system.description:
Your physical prowess and connection to the divine have both grown and further merged. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you cast a cleric spell, the next time you hit with an unarmed strike, it deals additional radiant or necrotic damage (your choice) equal to your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.sjprqaclatqthzlh]{Martial Arts} die.
  • When you would gain a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ec1turlvb2g9ivgd]{Practiced Techniques} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.319mwkz0dd6sznnv]{Sign of Faith}, you can choose freely from either list.
  • Half your cleric levels count as adept levels for the purpose of the advancement of your martial arts die.
  • Half your adept levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of all aspects of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.s4iiatrup3e3virw]{Channel Divinity} feature.
